pr_title: DPC-981 Update test database config to use separate test database

timeline.bodyText: Based on the travis error, we may need to use an ENV var for this. If so, we should use a different env var name than 'DATABASE_URL' , e.g. 'TEST_DATABASE_URL' and configure travis to use the new env var name. That way the test database will never be confused for another environment's database.
timeline.author: switzersc-usds
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -64,7 +64,7 @@ test:
   # The password associated with the postgres role (username).
   password: <%= ENV.fetch("DB_PASS", nil) %>
 
-  url: <%= ENV.fetch("DATABASE_URL", "postgresql://localhost/dpc-website_test") %>
+  url: "postgresql://localhost/dpc-website_test"

replies.bodyText:
So under test put url: <%= ENV.fetch("TEST_DATABASE_URL", the url) %>
How do we configure travis?
replies.author: Sun-Mountain

replies.bodyText: @nickrobison-usds is going to walk me thru the travis thing.
replies.author: Sun-Mountain

timeline.message:
DPC-981: Added TEST_DB enviroment variable

Inject new test database settings into Docker Compose for picking up within Travis.
